Japanese: げんざい　ちょうせいちゅうです

Label: SilentPokecenterTextString2

text
line

para

para
line
done
Japanese:
もうしわけありませんが
ただいま　しゅうりちゅう　でして

かいふくは　できません

まちから　でるときは
じゅうぶんに　おきをつけ　ください
English:
We're terribly
sorry, but as
we're currently
doing maintenance,
we can't heal
your #MON at
the moment.

Please be very
careful when you
step out of town.

Starts (JP):
text
line
cont
cont
cont
done
Japanese:
あそこに　ある　パソコンは
トレーナー　だったら
いつでも　むりょうで
つかうことが　できるよ
きが　きいてるよな！
English:
If you're a
trainer, you can
use that PC over
there anytime for
free! Thoughtful
of them, isn't it?

Label: SilentPokecenterTextString4
Starts (JP):
text
line

para
line

para
done
Japanese:
いま　じゅんびちゅうの
きかいは　すごいらしいよ

なんでも　ときを　こえて
ポケモンが　こうかん　できるって！

ほんとかな？
English:
I heard that the
machine they're
in the middle of
setting up is
really amazing!

Apparently it can
leap through time
to trade #MON!

I wonder if it's
true?

Label: SilentPokecenterTextString5
Japanese:
こいつ　へルガー
いままでにない　タイプの　ポケモンさ
English:
This is HOUNDOOM!
It's a #MON of
a completely new
type.
